item.title: The Itanium Flop
item.description: I wake up in the morning with ideas that please me, and some of those ideas actually please me also later in the day when I’ve entered them into my computer. - Donald Knuth I’m on a bit of a Knuth kick right now, and I’ve been procrastinating studying, and homework to find interviews, and papers by the master himself. I currently have a list of microfiche references to check out as soon as I get to the basement of my university’s library: Woot, computational necromancy!
